name: my kids and rabbits collection - free
name_original: my kids and rabbits collection - free
description:
This game is made especially for children. The difficulty and its graphics are suitable for a young audience (under 8). This application is composed of two different sets:

first game:
In this game your child drives a bowling ball. The goal is to pick up bowling without ever touching the edges of the track. This is both a game of skill and speed. Playable one or two players. When a level is successful your child wins a rabbit photo.

second game:
In this game your child uses a mallet to tap moles arising of a hole. The goal is to make as many points in a short time. Playable one or two players. When a level is successful your child wins a rabbit photo.

Characteristics :
- Gameplay suitable for children.
- Universe suitable for children on the theme of rabbits.
- Three difficulty levels.
- Simple interface suitable for children.
- 2 different games available.
- 2 possible players on one device.
- 40 pictures of rabbits to release.

the following languages ​​are available:
Albanian, English, Basque, Catalan, Croatian, Danish, Spanish, Estonian, French, Finnish, Galician, Welsh, Hungarian, Indonesian, Irish, Icelandic, Italian, Latvian, Lithuanian, Malaysian, Dutch, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese, Romanian, Slovenian, Slovak, Swedish, Tagalog, Czech, Turkish, Finnish, Maltese.
